_header: Come now good Lord come now our Saviour
_description: ‘Veni redemptor gentium’ — eight stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Come now gud lord now come owr savyourCome shew thy byrth of mary
                    modyr & mayde…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…As well in erth os in the heyvyns hyeNow and euer Amen
                    incessauntly
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             The Middle English Penitential Lyric.
Columbia University Studies in English.
         New York: Columbia Press, 1911: 10-13.
Patterson,  Frank A.
